title: Lincoln [Soundtrack]
description:
In a career spanning almost six decades, John Williams has composed some of the most recognizable film scores in the history of motion pictures including Star Wars, Jaws, the Indiana Jones films, E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial, Schindler's List and the first three Harry Potter films. Winner of twenty-one GrammyÃ‚Â® Awards, four Golden GlobeÃ‚Â® Awards and five Academy AwardsÃ‚Â®, Williams is easily the most recognized composer working in film today. He has a long association with Steven Spielberg, composing music for all but two of Spielberg's feature films, most recently on the Academy AwardÃ‚Â® -nominated scores for The Adventures of Tintin and Warhorse.
